sub_title: Customer Success | SaaS & Technology | Ex-Xero | Seeking opportunity in the Netherlands
summary:
As a highly motivated, results-driven and pragmatic SaaS and technology professional with outstanding interpersonal skills, I am passionate about delivering optimal customer experiences. A consistently high performer and collaborative team player, I have a proven ability to build enduring relationships whilst working effectively with cross-functional teams. I pride myself on taking the time to thoroughly understand stakeholder requirements, and on my commitment to going the extra mile to add real value. I have an empathetic, supportive approach, and am known as a trusted, capable subject matter expert who is relied on as a safe pair of hands in a crisis. 

I am seeking a position in which I can leverage my customer-centric approach and my extensive experience within complex, dynamic environments to achieve high-quality results.

Core Competencies:
•	An empathetic and engaging communicator who tailors key messaging to suit different audiences
•	A confident, astute salesperson who balances commercial success with a human-centred approach
•	Builds lasting, mutually beneficial relationships internal and external stakeholders at all levels
•	Solutions-focused with excellent problem-solving skills and a willingness to think outside the box
•	Highly analytical with well-developed technical acumen and an ability to extract value-add insights 
•	A capable project manager with a track record of delivering successful results on time, to budget
•	Organised and process-driven with sound planning skills and an ability to manage multiple tasks
•	Level-headed and practical with superb negotiating and influencing skills and good judgement 
•	Values-driven with high levels of integrity and loyalty, and a commitment to embracing diversity

profile_positions.description: Responsible for building strong relationships with app partners on the Xero App Partner Programme and Xero App Store, and as their main point of contact, identifying and resolving issues and concerns and providing timely support. My role also involved developing and executing strategies to drive partner adoption, engagement and retention, whilst collaborating with cross-functional teams such as product, engineering and product marketing.
profile_positions.title: App Partner Success Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Provided support to SMBs and Accountants in their use of Xero, WorkflowMax, Xero Practice Manager and Xero Projects software via phone, email and in-person meetings. With dedication, identified and addresses customer issues and owned them to full resolution. I also provided product training, technical support and troubleshooting to assist customers with making best use of our products and services, whilst collaborating closely with technical and product teams to ensure optimal customer experience.

Additionally, I worked as a Curriculum Lead, tasked with the responsibility of development and delivery of a new training programme to assist existing Customer Experience Specialists to upskill onto a new support queue.
profile_positions.title: Customer Experience Specialist - Business Management

profile_positions.description: In this role, I was responsible for responding to customer enquiries and troubleshooting technical problems with products, software, and systems. This involved identifying, diagnosing, and resolving issues, escalating more complex questions to higher-tier support as needed and providing feedback to product development teams based on customer insights to help improve product and service quality.
profile_positions.title: Technical Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Vector is a New Zealand energy company which runs a portfolio of businesses delivering energy and communication services across Australasia and the Pacific. Its primary business is electricity distribution, along with distributing piped gas.

I developed and implemented health and safety policies and procedures in compliance with regulatory requirements and industry standards, including conducting regular risk assessments of hazards and implementing controls to mitigate risks to employees and visitors. I took corrective action when necessary and maintained accurate records of investigations, training, and compliance.

As part of this role, I conducted a thorough review of how training records were recorded, identified inefficiencies and implemented a new system to streamline the process. I facilitated this by creating new templates and new record-keeping documents to make the administrative process for site managers more manageable and less time-consuming. As a result, records were more accurate and easily accessible and this improved the efficiency and effectiveness of health and safety operations, with training compliance consistently sitting at a minimum of 90% for the tenure of my role.
profile_positions.title: Health and Safety Administrator
